text: Quick Kushed Nasrudin's wife one night : There are thieves in the house. I see the lumps they left in the garden. Nasrudin put aside his bedclothes and started to go out the window. What are you doing? His wife asked him. As long as they're searching our miserable possessions, I'm gonna steal their bags. FIN
title: Ladrones
author: nan Anónimo
